text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the author sets, fixes, or legally approves the public retail price under French law. The candidate answer states, \"You can negotiate the retail price as part of your publishing contract\" and later, \"Rather than fixating on the retail price, focus on negotiating your royalty rate and contract terms.\" This implies negotiation power but does not explicitly state the legal position under French law regarding who sets or approves the final retail price, which is the core requirement of the criterion.", "criterion_id": "a4b9ac1f-ad65-4795-8621-04e72c36c1f3"}
